participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Curious and thoughtful, with a passion for knowledge and adventure.
participant_1.background: My first big purchase was a new laptop to help me with my job search. I currently suffer from social anxiety. I enjoy spending my weekends training with edged weapons and reading about mountaineering. I am a fourteen year old living with my mom and grandparents. My hair is long and blonde.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, with a love for storytelling and cooking.
participant_2.background: I like to change my hair color based on the stories I collect. My music taste is different from my parents' generation. I enjoy cooking my favorite Asian food with my son. I am a librarian who is afraid to tell my girlfriend about the romance novel I found for her. I am in gymnastics.

content.text: Not much, just relaxing after a long day of work.
What do you do for work?
Oh, cool! I've always wanted to be a librarian.
It's a lot of fun, but it can be pretty stressful at times.
I can imagine. What's your favorite part of the job?
I love helping people find the books they're looking for.
I also love getting to read new books all the time.
I love reading too. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a lot of different genres, but my favorite is probably historical fiction.
I've never been much of a history buff, but I can see how historical fiction could be really interesting.
It is! There are so many great stories from history that have been turned into books.
That's true. I've been meaning to read more historical fiction, but I just haven't had the time.
You should definitely check out some of the books by Ken Follett. He's one of my favorite historical fiction authors.
I'll definitely do that. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! It's always nice to talk to someone who loves to read.
